channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sen. Warren says banking panel should focus on Trump's attacks on Fed independence
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Sen. Elizabeth Warren, the top Democrat on the Senate Banking Committee, about Stephen Miran's nomination to the Fed a...

item.title: Are creatine supplements all that they're pumped up to be?
item.description: Creatine supplements have long become increasingly popular as social media influencers tout their benefits. What does the evidence say?

item.title: Giorgio Armani, Italian Fashion Designer, Dies at 91

item.title: Inside Trump’s Unorthodox Climate Attacks in Courts Nationwide
item.description: The administration is cranking up efforts to kill state laws and legal cases that would force fossil-fuel companies to pay for climate damage.

item.title: Whistle-Blower Complaints Detail Tension Over Vaccines at N.I.H.
item.description: Two former agency leaders said the administration’s “hostility” toward vaccines had spread to the agency’s top ranks.

item.title: Lisbon Funicular Crash: What to Know About Cause and Victims
item.description: At least 16 people were killed after the Glória funicular, one of the city’s most popular tourist attractions, derailed and crashed.

item.description: President Emmanuel Macron of France is hosting a meeting of leaders who will review options for protecting any peace with Russia.
